articles.title: Disney's Star Wars Costumes Make the Jump to Comic-Con - IGN
articles.description:
Click through to see the lavish display of official Star Wars costumes on display at Comic-Con, including some new suits seen in the upcoming Star Wars: Andor.

(all photos by Scott Collura)

articles.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever Funko Pops Are Up for Preorder - IGN
articles.description: Coming in November, a new line of Black Panther: Wakanda Forever Funko Pops is up for preorder at Amazon.
